member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.RawVideoFrameDataFilter
member.summary: Raw video frame capture filter, this can be used to specify if the OnRawVideoFrameAvailableYUV callback will be passed all 3 YUV planes (RawVideoFrameData.IntensityAndColor) or just the Y (RawVideoFrameData.Intensity) plane.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.MaximumRawVideoFrameQueue
member.summary: Maximum number of raw video frames that are queued per Unity frame. If more frames are received than this number, the oldest frames are dropped. 1 is the default; this means only the most recent raw video frame will be sent to ther user per game frame. You can set this value to 0 to have no limit to the size of the queue, however, if it is not drained quick enough, you may run out of memory.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.DroppedRawVideoFramesLastUpdate
member.summary: Count of the amount of raw video frames dropped last update that were beyond the currently set MaximumRawVideoFrameQueue.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.Connect
member.summary: Connect to camera resource and register callbacks. Only one connection to the camera resource is supported at a time.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed to connect to camera device due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed to connect to camera device due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnect from camera resource and unregister callbacks.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.CaptureImage(System.String)
member.summary: Captures an image from the camera and writes a jpeg to the specified path.
member.param: Path to write the captured image.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericBadType if failed due to invalid capture type.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericInvalidOperation if failed due to on-going video recording.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.CaptureRawImageAsync(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCameraOutputFormat)
member.summary: Initiates a raw image capture request. Register to OnRawImageAvailable event to get result if format is JPEG. OnRawImageAvailableYUV to get result if format is YUV_420_888 If this function is invoked before the camera sensor has locked AE and AWB, it will be blocked until AE (Auto Exposure), AWB (Auto Whitebalance) is locked and then starts to capture. The capture itself is asynchronous
member.param: MLCameraOutputFormat of the output type
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericBadType if failed due to invalid capture type.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericInvalidOperation if failed due to on-going video recording.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.StartVideoCapture(System.String)
member.summary: Starts capturing a video to write as an MP4 to the specified path.
member.param: Path to write the video.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericBadType if failed to prepare for capture due to invalid capture type.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.

member.summary: Starts capturing video from the color camera. Frames are returned with OnRawVideoFrameAvailableYUV callback.

MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericBadType if failed to prepare for capture due to invalid capture type.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.StopVideoCapture
member.summary: Stops capturing video. If initiated with StartVideoCapture(string) also write as an MP4 to the path specified with StartVideoCapture(string).
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed to start video recording due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.PrepareCapture(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCameraCaptureType,UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCameraCaptureSettings@)
member.summary: Prepare a capture for manual submission, allowing modifying of the capture settings.
member.param: The type of capture you will be submitting. This must match the capture type of SubmitCapture()
Structure containing all of the existing capture settings that can be viewed or modified. Must be passed into SubmitCapture
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed to prepare for capture due to invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed to prepare for capture due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericBadType if failed to prepare for capture due to invalid capture type.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed to prepare for capture due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.SubmitCapture(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCameraCaptureSettings@,System.String)
member.summary: Submit a previously prepared capture and execute the capture itself. If MLCameraCaptureType.Video is submitted, users must call StopVideoCapture() to stop capture at a later time.
member.param: Structure containing the settings used for this capture
When captureType is of type Video or Image (but not ImageRaw), filePath must be a valid target path for the output capture
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericInvalidOperation if failed to capture image due to on-going video recording.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed to start capture or recording due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed to start capture or recording due to invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed to start capture or recording due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed to start video recording due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.GetIntrinsicCalibrationParameters(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCVCameraIntrinsicCalibrationParameters@)
member.summary: Get camera intrinsic parameter. Requires ComputerVision privilege.
member.param: Output structure containing intrinsic parameters on success.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if unable to retrieve intrinsic parameter.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLCamera.GetFramePose(System.UInt64,UnityEngine.Matrix4x4@)
member.summary: Get transform between world origin and the camera. This method relies on a camera timestamp that is normally acquired from the MLCameraResultExtras structure, therefore this method is best used within a capture callback to maintain as much accuracy as possible. Requires ComputerVision privilege.
member.param: Time in nanoseconds to request the transfom.
Output transformation matrix on success.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if outTransform parameter was not valid (null).
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed to obtain transform due to internal error.

member.summary: Returns the most recent error code.
member.returns: Most recent MLCameraError.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLContacts.AddContact(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLContactsContact,System.UInt64@)
member.summary: Add a new contact to the address book. Contact must contain a name, at least one email address or one phone number, and it must not be a duplicate or the operation will fail. Contact ID is assigned upon successful completion, any ID specified in the input will be ignored OnContactAdded will be raised if the operation completes successfully OnOperationFailed will be raised if the operation fails to complete
member.param: The contact to add
Unique identification handle for this operation that can be used as a reference
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if sucessfully submitted
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if either of the parameters are invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLContacts.UpdateContact(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLContactsContact,System.UInt64@)
member.summary: Update an existing contact in the address book. Contacts are matched by ID and updatedContact must contain a valid ID. Contact must contain a name and at least one email address or one phone number. OnContactUpdated will be raised if the operation completes successfully OnOperationFailed will be raised if the operation fails to complete
member.param: The contact to update, with the updated information
Unique identification handle for this operation that can be used as a reference
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if sucessfully submitted
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if either of the parameters are invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLContacts.DeleteContact(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLContactsContact,System.UInt64@)
member.summary: Delete an existing contact in the address book. Contacts are matched by ID and removedContact must contain a valid ID. OnContactDeleted will be raised if the operation completes successfully OnOperationFailed will be raised if the operation fails to complete
member.param: The contact to delete
Unique identification handle for this operation that can be used as a reference
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if sucessfully submitted
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if either of the parameters are invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLDispatcher
member.summary: This interface is to let an application query the platform to handle things that the app itself cannot or wants someone else to handle. For example, if an application comes across a schema tag that it doesn't know what to do with, it can query the patform to see if some other application might. This can be useful for handling http://, https:// or other customSchema://<arg1>/<arg2> Apart from handling schema tags in URIs, this interface can also be used to query the platform to handle a type of file based on file-extension or mime-type

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLDispatcher.TryOpenAppropriateApplication(System.String)
member.summary: Try to open the application that is registered to support the given URI.
member.param: The URI to pass into the dispatch service.
member.returns: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful. MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to an internal invalid input parameter. MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error. MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory. MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Dispatch* if a dispatch specific error occurred.

member.summary: Gets a readable version of the result code as an ASCII string.
member.param: The MLResult that should be converted.
member.returns: ASCII string containing a readable version of the result code.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTargetTrackingStatus
member.summary:
Identifies the status of an image target.
Each MLImageTargetResult will include a ImageTrackerTargetStatus giving the current status of the target.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTargetTrackingStatus.Tracked
member.summary: Image target is tracked. The image tracker system will provide a 6 DOF pose when queried using MLSnapshotGetTransform function.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTargetTrackingStatus.Unreliable
member.summary: Image target is tracked with low confidence. The image tracker system will still provide a 6 DOF pose. But this pose might be inaccurate and might have jitter. When the tracking is unreliable one of the following two events will happen quickly : Either the tracking will recover to MLImageTrackerTargetStatus_Tracked or tracking will be lost and the status will change to MLImageTrackerTargetStatus_NotTracked.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTargetTrackingStatus.NotTracked
member.summary: Image target is lost. The image tracker system will not report any pose for this target. Querying for the pose using MLSnapshotGetTransform will return false.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTargetResult
member.summary: Represents the image target result.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTargetResult.Position
member.summary: Position of the target. This is not valid if the target is not being tracked.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTargetResult.Rotation
member.summary: Orientation of the target. This is not valid if the target is not being tracked.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTargetResult.Status
member.summary: Status of the target. Every target will have an associated status indicating the current tracking status.

member.summary:
Constructs the MLImageTarget object with specified parameters. Image target's name.
Texture2D representing the image target. The size of the texture should not be changed. Set the "Non Power of 2" property of Texture2D to none.
Longer dimension of the image target in scene units. Default is meters. Tracking result callback for this image target. Handle for the image tracker.
Set this to true if the position of this image target in the physical world is fixed and its surroundings are planar (ex: walls, floors, tables, etc).

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLInput.TriggerDownThreshold
member.summary: The threshold used to determine when the trigger has been squeezed enough to be considered pressed. The trigger will remain in the pressed state until its reading goes below TriggerUpThreshold. TriggerDownThreshold must be larger than TriggerUpThreshold.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLInput.TriggerUpThreshold
member.summary: The threshold used to determine when the trigger has been released enough to be considered released. The trigger will remain in the released state until its reading goes above TriggerDownThreshold. TriggerUpThreshold must be smaller than TriggerDownThreshold.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLLocation.GetLastCoarseLocation(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLLocationData@)

MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error (no device, dll not found, no API symbols).

MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Location... if specific location error.
member.param: Gets device last known valid coarse location. Only updates when getting the location succeeds. Latitude and Longitude of 0 should be assumed an Invalid Location.

MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to invalid input parameter.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLNetworking.GetWifiData(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLNetworkingWifiData@)
member.summary: Retrieves data from the current wifi network.
member.param: Reference to MLNetworkingWifiData to populate.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if wifiData parameter is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.ServiceNotAvailable if the corresponding service is not available.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.ServiceError if the corresponding service returned with error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.WiFiDataStructureVersionError if the version number in MLNetworkingWiFiDataInternal is not recognized.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.WiFiServiceInvalidState if the WiFi service is not in the right state.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.

MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.ServiceNotAvailable if the corresponding service is not available.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.ServiceError if the corresponding service returned with error.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPrivilegeId
member.summary: Privilege Types: AutoGranted - Once it is included in the manifest the application is granted the privilege. Sensitive - Must be requested at runtime, as well as in the manifest, because it requires user consent on first use. Reality - Must be requested at runtime and every time the application gains focus, as well as in the manifest, because it requires user consent every active session.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPrivileges.CheckPrivilege(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPrivilegeId)
member.summary: Checks whether the application has the specified privileges. This does not solicit consent from the end-user.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeGranted if the privilege is granted.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeNotGranted if the privilege is denied or has not yet been requested.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if the privilege system was not started.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPrivileges.RequestPrivilege(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPrivilegeId)
member.summary: Requests the specified privileges. This may possibly solicit consent from the end-user.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeGranted if the privilege is granted.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeNotGranted if the privilege is denied.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if the privilege system was not started.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPrivileges.RequestPrivilegeAsync(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPrivilegeId,System.Action{UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLResult,UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPrivilegeId})
member.summary: Request the specified privileges. This may solicit consent from the end-user. Note: The asynchronous callback occurs within the main thread.
member.param: Callback to be executed when the privilege request has completed. The MLResult.Code returned could be one of the following: - MLResultCode.PrivilegeGranted if the privilege is granted. - MLResultCode.PrivilegeNotGranted if the privilege is denied. - MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if the privilege system was not started.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if the privilege request is in progress.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if request is a null pointer or the callback is not valid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if the privilege system was not started.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPrivileges.ProcessPendingQueries
member.summary: Process pending requests and call the callback specified in the startup config.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLTokenAgent.GetClientCredentials(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLTokenAgent.MLTokenAgentClientCredentials@)
member.summary: GetClientCredentials is a blocking function that accesses the cloud and returns a MLTokenAgentClientCredentials structure containing the users credentials and tokens for a particular service (Audience). The library deduces the Audience being requested from the name of the calling service.
member.param: MLTokenAgentClientCredentials output reference to a structure which was created with all its fields by the library. It must only be released using ReleaseClientCredentials.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.TokenAgent* if a token specific failure occurred during the operation.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLTokenAgent.GetClientCredentialsAsync(System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: GetClientCredentialsAsync invokes the GetClientCredentials function asynchronously (in a different thread).
member.param: A pointer to an MLInvokeFuture pointer which provides the means to poll for completion and to retrieve the credentials returned by MLTokenAgentGetClientCredentials. This pointer will be freed by the library before returning from the first (and last) call to MLTokenAgentGetClientCredentialsWait, after the asynchronous call completed, that is after MLTokenAgentGetClientCredentialsWait returns any value that is not MLResult.Pending.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.TokenAgent* if a token specific failure occurred during the operation.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLTokenAgent.GetClientCredentialsWait(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLInvokeFuture,System.UInt32,UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLTokenAgent.MLTokenAgentClientCredentials@)
member.summary: Having made a call to MLTokenAgentGetClientCredentialsAsync, the user can call MLTokenAgentGetClientCredentialsWait to detect whether the asynchronous call completed and if so, to retrieve the credentials in outCredentials. The call to MLTokenAgentGetClientCredentialsWait blocks until either msecTimeout msec elapses or the asynchronous function completes.
member.param: MLInvokeFuture returned by the GetClientCredentialsAsync function
The timeout in milliseconds.

Output reference where the credentials structure created by the library will be copied, if the asynchronous call completed.
The location pointed to by out_credentials was set to the address of the MLTokenAgentClientCredentials structure allocated by the library. The returned credentils must be released when no longer needed by calling MLTokenAgentReleaseClientCredentials If any other value is returned, the location pointed to by outCredentials is set to 0 (null).
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if the operation completed successfully before the timeout elapsed.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Pending if the timeout elapsed before the operation completed.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.TokenAgent* if a token specific failure occurred during the operation.
member.remarks: Note: 1. To poll without blocking use msecTimeout = 0 2. After the function returns true, future is freed by the library and must not be used again in a call to MLTokenAgentGetClientCredentialsWait.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLTokenAgent.ReleaseClientCredentials(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLTokenAgent.MLTokenAgentClientCredentials@)
member.summary: ReleaseClientCredentials releases all resources associated with the MLTokenAgentClientCredentials stucture that was returned by the library.
member.param: MLTokenAgentClientCredentials reference to a strcuture received using one of: GetClientCredentials or GetClientCredentialsWait.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if the operation completed successfully before the timeout elapsed.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.

member.summary: Gets a readable version of the result code as an ASCII string.
member.param: The MLResult that should be converted.
member.returns: ASCII string containing a readable version of the result code.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLWorldRays.MLWorldRaycastResultState
member.summary: Enumeration of raycast result states.

members.member:
Delegate used to convey the result of a raycast.
The state of the raycast result. Where in the world the collision happened. Normal to the surface where the ray collided. The confidence of the ray cast result. Confidence is a non-negative value from 0 to 1 where closer to 1 indicates a higher quality. \internal CAPI has custom result MLWorldRaycastResultState, thus we expose it instead of MLResult. \endinternal

member.summary: MLContentBinding class represents the binding between the virtual object/user content and the Persistent coordinate frame (PCF). It stores the offset of the content with respect to the PCF and restores it from the persistent store (MLPersistentStore).

member.summary: The orientation offset from PCF.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLContentBinding.Update
member.summary: Updates the binding information based on the PCF and GameObject locations. It will child the game object under the game object representing the PCF. It checks if the PCF is a good state before carrying out this operation
member.returns:
MLResult.code will be MLResult.Ok when operation is successful
MLResult.code will be MLResult.InvalidParam when GameObject is not set or PCF is not set or CurrentResult value in MLPCF is not Ok

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLContentBinding.Restore(System.Action{UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLContentBinding,UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLResult})
member.summary: Restores the binding between the PCF and the virtual object and returns the result through the callback. Restoration includes childing the virtual object under PCF game object. and restoring the old local offsets (rotation and position). Callback to be called when the restore finishes.
member.returns:
MLResult.code will be MLResult.Ok when operation is successful
MLResult.code will be MLResult.InvalidParam when GameObject is not set or PCF is not set or CurrentResult value in MLPCF is not Ok
MLResult.code will be MLResult.UnspecifiedFailure when MLPersistentCoordinateFrames is not started

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF
member.summary: MLPCF class is an abstraction for representing anchor points, called Persistent Coordinate Frames or PCFs, in the real world. PCFs cannot be created, modified or destroyed from the app level. Rather, we query the OS for any PCFs it has stored and query again to determine the PCF location, if it is within the vicinity.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF.CFUID
member.summary: The cfuid.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF.Position
member.summary: Position of the MLPCF for the current session

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF.Orientation
member.summary: Orientation of the MLPCF for the current session

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF.CurrentResult
member.summary:
Gets or sets the current result. It could be one of the following:
MLResultCode.Pending - Position/Orientation does not exist
MLResultCode.Ok - Position/Orientation is reliable
Otherwise - Position/Orientation is unreliable

member.name: E:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF.OnCreate
member.summary: OnCreated event gets fired when a new PCF gets created. The parameter is the the instance of the MLPCF that got created.

member.name: E:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF.OnUpdate
member.summary: OnUpdate event gets fired when the position, orientation of the PCF changes.

member.name: E:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF.OnLost
member.summary: OnLost is triggered when the CurrentResult changes MLResultCode.Ok to something other than MLResultCode.Ok. This indicates that the PCF is no longer available in the current map.

member.name: E:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF.OnRegain
member.summary: OnRegain is triggered when the CurrentResult changes from something other than MLResultCode.Ok to MLResultCode.Ok. This indicates that the PCF was found again after it was lost.

member.summary: MLPersistentCoordinateFrames class contains the API to interface with the Persistent Coordinate Frame C API.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames.DelayBetweenAllPCFsQueryInSeconds
member.summary: Delay between querying for all PCFs. Used by GetAllPCFs(...)

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames.StartTimeOutInSeconds
member.summary: Initialization timeout in seconds. Countdown begins when calling Start()

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames._pcfMap
member.summary: Map of PCFs that we're currently tracking. A PCF is only tracked when it's added via QueueForUpdates().

member.name: E:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames.OnInitialized
member.summary:
Event for notifying if the system is ready. Event Handlers are expected to stop listening immediately after the event is triggered. The parameter could be one of the following:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if it failed to become ready after StartTimeOutInSeconds.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames.IsReady
member.summary: variable for polling if the system is ready

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames.Start
member.summary: Starts the PersistentCoordinateFrame API.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to other internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PassableWorldLowMapQuality if map quality is too low for content persistence. Continue building the map.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PassableWorldUnableToLocalize if currently unable to localize into any map. Continue building the map.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames.StartAPI
member.summary: Starts the API.

member.summary: Cleans up unmanaged memory

member.summary: Update Transforms of PCFs that we're tracking

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames.QueueForUpdates(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF)
member.summary: Adds the given PCF to the list of PCFs that are updated every frame
member.param: PCF to be updated

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames.FindClosestPCF(UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Action{UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLResult,UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF})
member.summary: Retrieve closest known PCF to the given position and query for the position of the PCF.
member.param: The position of the object we want to anchor
The method called when the closest PCF is found
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to an invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Pending if the PCF system isn't fully initialized. Poll the IsReady or listen to OnInitialized event to know if the system is ready.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to other internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PassableWorldLowMapQuality if map quality is too low for content persistence. Continue building the map.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PassableWorldUnableToLocalize if currently unable to localize into any map. Continue building the map.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames.GetPCFPosition(UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF,System.Action{UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLResult,UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF})
member.summary: Gets the PCF position from the transform.
member.param: MLPCF with a valid CFUID
Called with the result when the return value of the function is MLResult.IsOk
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to an invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Pending if the PCF system isn't fully initialized. Poll the IsReady or listen to OnInitialized event to know if the system is ready.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to other internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.SnapshotPoseNotFound if Coordinate Frame is valid, but not found in the current pose snapshot.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPersistentCoordinateFrames.GetAllPCFs(System.Collections.Generic.List{UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLPCF}@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of all the PCFs stored in the device. However, only PCFs in the current Landscape can be located. Call GetPCFPosition() on each PCF to determine their location. Note: It is ill-advised to call this function often with DelayBetweenAllPCFsQuery set to near zero because the underlying mechanism is expensive.
member.param: Pcf list.
Max results.
member.returns:
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Pending if the PCF system isn't fully initialized. Poll the IsReady or listen to OnInitialized event to know if the system is ready.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to other internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PassableWorldLowMapQuality if map quality is too low for content persistence. Continue building the map.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PassableWorldUnableToLocalize if currently unable to localize into any map. Continue building the map.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLInvokeFuture
member.summary: MLInvokeFuture represents a type which is opaque (incomplete) to users of this library. A pointer to an MLInvokeFuture is returned by the Async function. Users pass it to the Wait function to determine if the asynchronous method has completed and to retrieve the result if it has.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTrackerTargetSettings
member.summary: Represents the settings of an Image Target All fields are required for an Image Target to be tracked.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTrackerTargetSettings.Name
member.summary: Name of the target - This name has to be unique across all targets added to the Image Tracker. - Caller should allocate memory for this. - Encoding should be in UTF8. - This will be copied internally.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTrackerTargetSettings.LongerDimension
member.summary: LongerDimension refer to the size of the longer dimension of the physical Image Target in Unity scene units..

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTrackerTargetSettings.IsStationary
member.summary:
Set this to \c true to improve detection for stationary targets.
- An Image Target is a stationary target if its position in the physical world does not change. - This is best suited for cases where the target is stationary and when the local geometry (environment surrounding the target) is planar. - When in doubt set this to false.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTrackerTargetSettings.IsEnabled
member.summary:
Set this to \c true to track the image target.
- Disabling the target when not needed marginally improves the tracker CPU performance. - This is best suited for cases where the target is temporarily not needed. If the target no longer needs to be tracked it is best to use remove the target.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTrackerImageFormat
member.summary: When adding image targets to the Image Tracker using MLImageTrackerAddTargetFromArraySpecify the image format using this enum.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTrackerSettings
member.summary: Represents the list of Image Tracker settings.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.MagicLeap.MLImageTrackerSettings.MaxSimultaneousTargets
member.summary:
Maximum number of Image Targets that can be tracked at any given time.
If the tracker is already tracking the maximum number of targets possible then it will stop searching for new targets which helps reduce the load on the CPU. For example, if you are interested in tracking a maximum of x targets simultaneously from a list y (x < y) targets then set this parameter to x.
The valid range for this parameter is from 1 through 25.

member.summary: Class containing utility functions to convert Unity Texture to Lumin OS compatible data structures.

member.name: M:MagicLeapInternal.MLTextureUtils.ConvertToByteArray(UnityEngine.Texture2D,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Convert Unity Texture2D to a byte array. Texture2D should be in one of the following formats: DXT1, RGBA32, RGB24. For DXT1 and RGBA32, resulting byte array is in RGBA format. For RGB24, resulting byte array is in RGB format. The origin of the byte array will be at the top left corner. Returns null on unsupported formats.
member.param: Texture to extract byte array from
Out parameter to determine how many bytes per pixel
